tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE RetirementPlans (
  plan_id VARCHAR(50) PRIMARY KEY,
  advisor_id VARCHAR(50),
  client_id VARCHAR(50),
  current_balance DECIMAL,
  contribution_amount DECIMAL,
  retirement_age INT
)

CREATE TABLE FinancialAdvisors (
  advisor_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  advisor_name VARCHAR,
  advisor_email VARCHAR
)

CREATE TABLE Clients (
  client_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  client_name VARCHAR,
  client_email VARCHAR,
  advisor_id INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (advisor_id) REFERENCES FinancialAdvisors(advisor_id)
)

CREATE TABLE RetirementPlans (
  plan_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  client_id INT,
  plan_details VARCHAR,
  plan_status VARCHAR,
  FOREIGN KEY (client_id) REFERENCES Clients(client_id)
)

CREATE TABLE financial_advisors (
    advisor_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    advisor_name VARCHAR(255),
    service_type VARCHAR(50),
    years_of_experience INT
)

CREATE TABLE clients (
    client_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    client_name VARCHAR(255),
    age INT,
    retirement_plan VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE retirement_plans (
    plan_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    plan_name VARCHAR(255),
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE adjustments (
    adjustment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    plan_id INT,
    client_id INT,
    adjustment_date DATE,
    adjustment_reason VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE FinancialAdvisors (
	advisor_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	advisor_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
	advisor_email VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE Clients (
	client_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	client_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
	client_email VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
	client_age INT NOT NULL,
	client_retirement_age INT NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE RetirementPlans (
	plan_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	plan_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
	advisor_id INT,
	FOREIGN KEY (advisor_id) REFERENCES FinancialAdvisors(advisor_id)
)

CREATE TABLE Circumstances (
	circumstance_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	circumstance_description TEXT NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE Adjustments (
	adjustment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	plan_id INT,
	circumstance_id INT,
	adjustment_amount DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL,
	FOREIGN KEY (plan_id) REFERENCES RetirementPlans(plan_id),
	FOREIGN KEY (circumstance_id) REFERENCES Circumstances(circumstance_id)
)
